name: lnRoM

name: lnRoM

name: SMD
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: yi_first

name: SMD
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: yi_second
exec_formula: (1 - 3 / (4 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) - 1) ) * ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ) )

name: SMD_paired

name: lnHWE_A
vars_required: n_AA, n_Aa, n_aa
special_warnings: Cannot accept values of 0 for n_AA, n_Aa, or n_aa
formula: log((n_Aa/(n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa)) / (2*sqrt((n_AA/(n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa)) * (n_aa/(n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa)))))
label: yi_first
exec_formula: log((input$n_Aa/(input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa)) / (2*sqrt((input$n_AA/(input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa)) * (input$n_aa/(input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa)))))

name: lnM_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2, r
special_warnings: Results are only reliable with SAFE method
label: yi_first
exec_formula: log(sqrt(((((input$n1 * input$n2) / (input$n1 + input$n2)) * (input$x1 - input$x2)^2) - (((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))) / ((2 * input$n1 * input$n2) / (input$n1 + input$n2)))) - log(sqrt((((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))))

name: reciprocal
vars_required: n, x, sd
label: vi_first

name: lnRoM
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnRoM cannot accept x1 or x2 ≤ 0.
label: vi_first

name: lnRoM
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnRoM cannot accept x1 or x2 ≤ 0.
label: vi_second
exec_formula: input$sd1^2 / (input$n1 * input$x1^2) + input$sd2^2 / (input$n2 * input$x2^2) + 0.5 * ( (input$sd1^4 / (input$n1^2 * input$x1^4)) + (input$sd2^4 / (input$n2^2 * input$x2^4)))

name: SMD
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first
exec_formula: ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: SMD
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: (1 - 3 / (4 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) - 1) )^2 * ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: SMD_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first
exec_formula: ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: SMD_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: (1 - 3 / (4 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) - 1) )^2 * ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: SMD
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first
exec_formula: ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: SMD
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: (1 - 3 / (4 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) - 1) )^2 * ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: SMD_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first
exec_formula: ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: SMD_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: SMD can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: (1 - 3 / (4 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) - 1) )^2 * ((input$n1 + input$n2) / (input$n1 * input$n2)) + ((input$x1 - input$x2) / sqrt( ((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2) ))^2 / (2 * (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))

name: lnRoM_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnRoM cannot accept x1 or x2 ≤ 0.
label: vi_first
exec_formula: (input$sd1^2 / (input$n1 * input$x1^2)) + (input$sd2^2 / (input$n2 * input$x2^2)) - ((2 * input$r * input$sd1 * input$sd2) / (input$x1 * input$x2 * sqrt(input$n1 * input$n2)))

name: lnOR
vars_required: a, b, c, d
special_warnings: If any group (a, b, c, d) is 0, lnOR will be incalculable. If this is the case with your data, add 0.5 to all groups and rerun.
label: vi_first

name: lnRR
vars_required: a, c, n1, n2
special_warnings: If any group (a, c) is 0, lnRR will be incalculable. If this is the case with your data, add 0.5 to all groups and rerun.
label: vi_first

name: lnCVR
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first

name: lnCVR
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: input$sd1^2/(input$n1 * input$x1^2) + input$sd1^4/(2 * input$n1^2 * input$x1^4) + input$n1/(2*(input$n1 - 1)^2) + input$sd2^2/(input$n2 * input$x2^2) + input$sd2^4/(2 * input$n2^2 * input$x2^4) + input$n2/(2*(input$n2 - 1)^2)

name: lnCVR_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first
exec_formula: input$sd1^2/(input$n1 * input$x1^2) + input$sd2^2/(input$n1 * input$x2^2) - 2*input$r*input$sd1*input$sd2/(input$n1 * input$x1 * input$x2) + 1/(input$n1 - 1) - input$r^2/(input$n1 - 1)

name: lnCVR_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: input$sd1^2/(input$n1 * input$x1^2) + input$sd1^4/(2 * input$n1^2 * input$x1^4) + input$sd2^2/(input$n1 * input$x2^2) + input$sd2^4/(2 * input$n1^2 * input$x2^4) - 2*input$r*input$sd1*input$sd2/(input$n1 * input$x1 * input$x2) + input$r^2 * input$sd1^2 * input$sd2^2 * (input$x1^4 + input$x2^4) / (2 * input$n1^2 * input$x1^4 * input$x2^4) + input$n1/(input$n1 - 1)^2 - input$r^2/(input$n1 - 1) + input$r^4 * (input$sd1^8 + input$sd2^8) / (2 * (input$n1 - 1)^2 * input$sd1^4 * input$sd2^4)

name: lnCVR
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first

name: lnCVR
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: input$sd1^2/(input$n1 * input$x1^2) + input$sd1^4/(2 * input$n1^2 * input$x1^4) + input$n1/(2*(input$n1 - 1)^2) + input$sd2^2/(input$n2 * input$x2^2) + input$sd2^4/(2 * input$n2^2 * input$x2^4) + input$n2/(2*(input$n2 - 1)^2)

name: lnCVR_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_first
exec_formula: input$sd1^2/(input$n1 * input$x1^2) + input$sd2^2/(input$n1 * input$x2^2) - 2*input$r*input$sd1*input$sd2/(input$n1 * input$x1 * input$x2) + 1/(input$n1 - 1) - input$r^2/(input$n1 - 1)

name: lnCVR_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, r, n1, n2
special_warnings: lnCVR can use normal or Wishart distribution to model variances. If unspecified with 'SAFE_distribution' argument, defaulting to Wishart
label: vi_second
exec_formula: input$sd1^2/(input$n1 * input$x1^2) + input$sd1^4/(2 * input$n1^2 * input$x1^4) + input$sd2^2/(input$n1 * input$x2^2) + input$sd2^4/(2 * input$n1^2 * input$x2^4) - 2*input$r*input$sd1*input$sd2/(input$n1 * input$x1 * input$x2) + input$r^2 * input$sd1^2 * input$sd2^2 * (input$x1^4 + input$x2^4) / (2 * input$n1^2 * input$x1^4 * input$x2^4) + input$n1/(input$n1 - 1)^2 - input$r^2/(input$n1 - 1) + input$r^4 * (input$sd1^8 + input$sd2^8) / (2 * (input$n1 - 1)^2 * input$sd1^4 * input$sd2^4)

name: lnHWE_A
vars_required: n_AA, n_Aa, n_aa
special_warnings: Cannot accept values of 0 for n_AA, n_Aa, or n_aa
formula: (1/(n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa)) * ((1/(n_Aa / (n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa))) + (1-(n_Aa / (n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa)))/(4*(n_AA / (n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa))*(n_aa / (n_AA + n_Aa + n_aa))))
label: vi_first
exec_formula: (1/(input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa)) * ((1/(input$n_Aa / (input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa))) + (1-(input$n_Aa / (input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa)))/(4*(input$n_AA / (input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa))*(input$n_aa / (input$n_AA + input$n_Aa + input$n_aa))))

name: lnM_paired
vars_required: x1, x2, sd1, sd2, n1, n2, r
special_warnings: Results are only reliable with SAFE method
label: vi_first
exec_formula: (1 / 4 * ((((input$n1 * input$n2) / (input$n1 + input$n2)) * (input$x1 - input$x2)^2) - (((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2)))^2) * ( (input$n1/2)^2 * ( ((2 * (input$sd1^2 / input$n1 + input$sd2^2 / input$n2)^4)/input$n1^2) + ((4 * (input$sd1^2 / input$n1 + input$sd2^2 / input$n2)^2 * (input$x1 - input$x2)^2)/input$n1) ) ) + ((((input$n1 * input$n2) / (input$n1 + input$n2)) * (input$x1 - input$x2)^2)^2 / (((input$n1 - 1) * input$sd1^2 + (input$n2 - 1) * input$sd2^2) / (input$n1 + input$n2 - 2))^2) * ((input$sd1^4 + input$sd2^4 + 2*input$r^2*input$sd1^2*input$sd2^2) / (2 * (n-1)))

name: lnOR
vars_required: a, b, c, d
special_warnings: If any group (a, b, c, d) is 0, lnOR will be incalculable. If this is the case with your data, add 0.5 to all groups and rerun.
label: yi_first

name: lnRR
vars_required: a, c, n1, n2
special_warnings: If any group (a, c) is 0, lnRR will be incalculable. If this is the case with your data, add 0.5 to all groups and rerun.
label: yi_first
